timetable_items.name: Health & Social Sciences
timetable_items.description: My secondary education degree was in Borsbeek Antwerp, during which I interned at both elderly housing centre's and elementary schools. Both were a huge learning experience in which some of the skills I had acquired during my time in scouting could be put to good use.

timetable_items.name: Art School
timetable_items.description: I've spent more than half of the saturdays in my life at this art school. This was the basis of my interest in illustration, storytelling, and graphic design. Sadly after 12 years, I had to graduate via zoom call.

timetable_items.name: Scouts Impeesa
timetable_items.description: Being a scout for 10+ years included so many learning experiences, from small things like independence and being open to new things. To bigger things like becoming a scout leader, and catering activities to different groups of children.

timetable_items.name: Graphic & Digital Design
timetable_items.description: Upgrading my hobby to my degree was a massive change. Learning print, brand, motion and web design were 3 amazing years. Making friends and making projects I love to this day.

timetable_items.name: ITP
timetable_items.description: Wrapping up my degree at AP hogeschool meant that I had to set my sights on not only my bachelor project, but also an internship. At In The Pocket I got the amazing opportunity to level up my UI and UX skills, the biggest lesson however was working in a team and following design guides set by a client or the company.

timetable_items.name: Game Graphics Production
timetable_items.description: Looking for more, I signed up for game graphics production. In the year I spent at DAE I learned to model low and high poly in Maya, stepped up my digital painting and environment design. And got to know procedural modelling in houdini.

timetable_items.name: Job Hunt
timetable_items.description: With a degree in Graphic and digital design in my pocket, and experience in 3D modelling. I'm now looking for something more. A new opportunity in UI, UX, web or graphic design. All the while putting my skills to work for my enjoyment, and hopefully to show off.
